name: Pit-Fighter
overview: Venture deep into the hidden world of the under-city to battle the world's toughest brawlers! In Pit-Fighter, the only rule is to survive. Choose your hero - Buzz, a former Pro Wrestler with a killer body slam! Ty, a Champion kickboxer and veteran of the Pit. Kato, a Karate legend with a lethal Dragon Punch! Try your skills against a ruthless gang of renegade warriors. Take on Chainman Eddie in a special Grudge Match! Use your brute strength and raw stamina to claw your way to the final round against The masked Warrior! See if you have what it takes to become the supreme Pit-Fighter!
